answers.text:
Hello Alireza,
The Topics section of the Knowledge Network has many resources of all kinds.  This is the topic section for Telecommuting:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/259/Telecommuting
This is a blog post concerning Telecommuting from the Blog section of ICMA.  It contains an overview of Telecommuting in local governments:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/blogs/blogpost/350/Telework_and_Local_Government
The Documents section of the Knowledge Network contains many documents; some of them might help with your thesis:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents
This is a report from the U.S. Department of Labor which details the effects of teleworking  in the economy:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/11448/Telework_and_the_New_Workplace_of_the_21st_Century
This article has information on how teleworking can be used by local governments to spur environmental efforts:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3276/Fleet_Management_GIS_and_Telework_Power_Green_Government_Efforts
And here is a sample teleworking program from the City of Austin.  This can help you understand the details of real policies used by local governments and counties:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2964/Telework_Program_Overview
I hope this helps, please post any more questions you might have.  We are happy to have you on the Knowledge Network!
Gabriel Brehm
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA
